title: Publish current app to production

requirements.text: Publish the current build (latest draft) to production so the live production URL serves the same functionality as the draft build.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is triggered and completes successfully.
Visiting the production URL loads the app without errors.
Core user flow remains functional in production (Internet Identity login, profile setup, car price prediction submission, and viewing prediction history).

constraints: Do not modify application features or behavior as part of this request; this is a publish-only action.
nonGoals: Adding new fields or changing the car price prediction logic.
